actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing support for a national day of remembrance for the workers of the nuclear weapons program of the United States.

summary.text: Supports the goals and ideals of a day of remembrance for the workers of the nuclear weapons programs of the United States, including uranium miners, millers, and haulers. Encourages the people of the United States to recognize such a day of remembrance.

titles.title: Expressing support for a national day of remembrance for the workers of the nuclear weapons program of the United States.
